tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE consensus_parameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
    parameter_value VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE consensus_logs (
	log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	parameter_id INTEGER REFERENCES consensus_parameters(parameter_id),
	config_id INTEGER REFERENCES network_configuration(config_id),
	log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
	log_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE parameter_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
    old_value DECIMAL,
    new_value DECIMAL,
    updated_on TIMESTAMP
);
